data.title: Bluegrass Ramble Concert schedule
data.text:
WOSU 89.7 Bluegrass Ramble

Music Showdates.

Last Update August 5, 2024

Please send updates or corrections to Chris Johnston via email at johnstonteam@hotmail.com Since schedules can change due to cancellation or weather., before traveling to an event please call to confirm with the show venue that the show is still a go. Although COVID restrictions have been lifted, please note that schedules could be tentative should the virus return. Not responsible for errors and omissions.

Standing Date Shows:

Third Friday through October—Vern McIntyre’s Appalachian Grass at Fibonacci Brewing Company 1445 Compton Rd, Cincinnati, OH 45231. 7-9 pm. Free

Every Thursday (except holidays) TNT Bluegrass at American Legion Post 285, 108 Waters Street, Hebron, OH 7-9 pm

Every 2nd & 4th Tuesday, Frosty Morning at American Legion Post 285, 108 Waters Street, Hebron, OH. Music begins at 6:30.

First and Third Monday each month. Doug Fox and the Cedar Hill Bluegrass Boys at VFW Banquet Hall, 1131 Sugar Grove Road, Lancaster, OH. 6:30-9:00 pm.

Every Wednesday Vern McIntyre's Appalachian Grass at Vinoklet Winery, 11069 Colerain Ave., Cincinnati, OH 6:30-8:30 pm.

3rd Sunday of every month, Wahlhalla Ramblers at Combustion Brewery and Tap Room, 2971 N. High Street, Columbus, OH 3-6 pm.

Jams:

Every Monday, 6-9 p.m. Jam Central Ohio at Summit Music Hall, 2210 Summit St., Columbus.

Every Thursday Jam at Dick’s Den, 2147 N. High Street. Call 614-268-9573 for details and time.

Every Wednesday 6-9 p.m. Linden Aerie Eagles 2252 at 3800 Westerville Road, Columbus.

Every Tuesday, weather permitting, Vam-Jam at the Famous Old Time Music Company, 1196 Moss Millville Rd. Hamilton, OH 6-8 pm. Note: This is an outdoor event. Cancelled if raining.

Every Thursday each month 6-8 p.m. slow jam at Violet Church, 8345 Blacklick Eastern Road, Pickerington.

Third Saturday each month 11 a.m.-5 p.m. jam and music workshops at Clinton Heights Lutheran Church, 15 Clinton Heights Ave., Columbus.

Every Saturday: Bluegrass Musicians Supply, 1370 South High Street, Columbus, OH. 10 am - 3 pm

Every Tuesday: Sterling Bluegrass Jamboree in Mt. Sterling. 5-7 pm

Beginning June 20th, monthly jam sessions at Thomas Auction Center, 176 South Main Street, Fredricktown, OH. Free. 7 pm

Second Thursday of the month: First Baptist Church of Richwood, fellowship hall, 101 East Ottawa Street, Richwood, OH 6 pm

Shows with specific dates:

Aug. 8-10—Cutting Up The Creek Bluegrass Festival, Elkins Creek Horse Camp, 223 Twp. Rd. 225 East, Pedro, OH. Feauturing Thursday Union Town and Drivin’ 23. Friday Kody Norris Show, Hammertown, The Next Page, Pickin’ Pair and 7 Mile Bluegrass. Saturday Lonesome River Band, Fenced In, Crabgrass, Poverty String Band and New Outlook. Info: 740-643-2416.

Aug 9—Mark Whitt & Truegrass at Byrnes Pub, 1248 W. Third Ave, Columbus, Ohio - 7PM

Aug. 9-10—Old Town Music and Arts Festival, 1449 Greenbush Cobb Road, Williamsburg, OH. Friday: Poor Edgar, Bedel & Hibbard, Kentucky Back Roads, Joe’s Truck Stop, Evan Lanier & the Bluegrass Express, Laid Back Country Picket, Seth Mulder & Midnight Run, Slippery Creek & Friends. Saturday: Joe’s Teuck Stop, Bedel & Hibbard, Poplar Ridge, The Harry Pedigo Band, Larry Sparks & the Lonesome Ramblers, Whiskey Bent Valley Boys, Larry Efaw & the Bluegrass Mountaineers, Slippery Creek and the Rumpke Mountain Boys. Music begins Friday at 1. Saturday at 11.

Aug. 10—Lafferty Pike at Clifton Opera House, 5 South Clay Street, Clifton, OH. Music begins at 7 pm.

Aug. 10—New Mountain Heritage at Sterling Bluegrass Jamboree, 26 East Main Street, Mt. Sterling, OH. Doors open at 5. Music begins at 6. Info: 614-323-6938.

Aug. 10—Lincoln Highway Bluegrass Band at Veterans Appreciation Day, Ashland County Airport, Ashland, OH 1-3 pm

Aug. 16—Ramblin’ Bluegrass Ensemble at Byrnes Pub, 1248 West 3rd Ave., Columbus. 7-9 pm

Aug. 16-18—Little River Bar & Grill Bluegrass Festival, 5627 Oregonian Rd, Oregonia, OH. Friday: Shady Pine and Burns & Moore. Saturday: Haddix Family, Tony Hale & Blackwater, Andrew Hubbard Band, Joe Waters and Slippery Creek. Sunday: Harmless Varments, Ma Crowe & Co. and Tadcasters. Music begins Friday at 6:30. Saturday and Sunday at noon.

Aug. 17—Bill Purk & Friends at Clifton Opera House, 5 South Clay Street, Clifton, OH. Music begins at 7 pm.

Aug. 17—Tim Shelton Syndicate at Sterling Bluegrass Jamboree, 26 East Main Street, Mt. Sterling, OH. Doors open at 5. Music begins at 6. Info: 614-323-6938.

Aug. 17—Sugarcreek Bluegrass at Lynd Fruit Farm’s Peach Festival, 9753 Morse Road, Pataskala, OH 1-3 pm

Aug. 18—WOSU presents Bluegrass at the Barn, Linden Aerie Eagles, 2252 Westerville Road, Columbus, OH. Featuring IIIrd Tyme Out, The Kody Norris Show & Po’ Ramblin’ Boys. Jamming too. Begins at 1 pm.

Aug. 21—Sarah Jaroz at Southern Theater, 21 East Main Street, Columbus, OH. 8 pm.

Aug. 22-24 Brown County Bluegrass Festival, Brown County Fairgrounds, Georgetown, OH. Featuring Thursday Peach Mountain Boys, Pinnacle Ridge, Duly Noted, Lorraine Jordan & Carolina Road and Lonesome River Band. Friday Creekside Collective, Harbourtown, Catahoula Drive, Lorraine Jordan & Carolina Road, Rhonda Vincent & The Rage and Edgar Loudermilk. Saturday Creekside Collective, Catahoula Drive, Hammertown, Russell Moore & IIIrd Tyme Out and Edgar Loudermilk. Thursday begins at 3:30, Friday at 11:00 and Saturday at 11:30.

Aug. 23—Woodpickers at Byrne’s Pub Bluegrass Happy Hour. 1248 W. 3rd Ave, Columbus, OH 7-9 pm

Aug. 24—Blackwater at Sterling Bluegrass Jamboree, 26 East Main Street, Mt. Sterling, OH. Doors open at 5. Music begins at 6. Info: 614-323-6938.

Aug. 28- Sept.1—Sam Jam Bluegrass Festival, Pike County Fairgrounds, Pikeville, OH featuring Thursday: David Mayfield Parade, Dave Adkins Band, Lonesome River Band, The Grascals And Gary Nichols Band. Friday: Tidalwave Road, Turning Ground, Tim Shelton Syndicate, Tim Shelton Syndicate (with Ronnie Bowman), Balsam Range and Scythian. Saturday: Drivin' 23, Blue Mafia, Amanda Cook Band, The Goodwin Brothers, The Steeldrivers and Sideline Revisited(Featuring Steve Dilling, Skip Cherryholmes,Troy Boone, Bailey Coe, and Daniel Greeson). Sunday: Wild Son

(Other performances TBD). Music begins each day at 1 pm.

Aug. 30—Boneyfiddle featuring Russell Moore & IIIrd Tyme Out, Bobby Maynard Family Band and Steve Perry. 112 2nd Street, Portsmouth, OH. 8 pm. Free event. Bring a lawn chair.

Aug. 30—Ramblin’ Bluegrass Ensemnle at Loose Rail Brewing, 37 West Waterloo Street, Canal Winchester. 7-10pm

Aug. 30—Other Brothers at Byrne’s Pub Bluegrass Happy Hour. 1248 W. 3rd Ave, Columbus, OH 7-9 pm

Aug. 30—Special Consensus at Steele Memorial Bandstand, Chautauqua Lakeside, 132 Park Row, Lakeside, OH 7 pm.

Aug. 30—Russel Moore & IIIrd Tyme Out, Bobby Maynard Family and Steve Perry at Final Friday in Boneyfiddle, 131 Front Street, Portsmouth, OH 5:30 pm. Free event. Bring a chair.

Aug. 31—Shawn Osborne & Hillbilly Tradition at Sterling Bluegrass Jamboree, 26 East Main Street, Mt. Sterling, OH. Doors open at 5. Music begins at 6. Info: 614-323-6938.

Sept. 3—Mark Whitt & Truegrass at Miami University Hamilton Campus, 221 High Street, Hamilton, OH. 7 pm

Sept. 6—Gipson & Fitz at Byrne’s Pub Bluegrass Happy Hour, 1248 West 3rd Ave., Columbus, OH 7-9 pm

Sept. 6—Town Mountain at Woodlands Tavern, 1200 West 3rd Ave, Columbus, OH 7 pm

Sept. 7—Rocky Creek at Clifton Opera House, 5 South Clay Street, Clifton, OH. Music begins at 7 pm.

Sept. 7—Lincoln Highway Bluegrass Band at Thomas Auction Center, 176 S. Main Street, Fredricktown, OH. 7 pm

Sept. 8—_The Kevin Prater Band at Claire Tavern & Grill, 818 Market Street, Clarinton, OH. 7 pm. Free Event

Sept. 12-14—Mohican Wilderness Bluegrass Festival, Mohican Wilderness Campground, 22462 Wally Road, Glenmont, OH featuring Thursday: Northwest Territory, Hunter Skeens and The Forerunners and Deeper Shade of Blue. Friday: Lincoln Highway Bluegrass Band, Caroline Owens, Crabgrass and Bourbon Revival. Saturday: Echo Valley, David Mayfield Parade, Kristy Cox & Grasstime, Breaking Grass and The Cleverlys. Music begins at 3 Thursday, 2 Friday and noon Saturday.

Sept. 13—Slate Ridge at Byrne’s Pub Bluegrass Happy Hour, 1248 West 3rd Avenue, Columbus, OH. 7-9 pm. No cover

Sept. 14—Laurel Mountain at Clifton Opera House, 5 South Clay Street, Clifton, OH. Music begins at 7 pm.

Sept. 14—Caroline Owens at Sterling Bluegrass Jamboree, 26 East Main Street, Mt. Sterling, OH. Doors open at 5. Music begins at 6. Info: 614-323-6938.

Sept. 15—Sierra Hull at Woodlands Tavern, 1200 West 3rd Avenue, Columbus, OH. 7 pm

Sept. 21—Lincoln Highway Bluegrass Band at Johnny Appleseed celebration, Mansfield, OH 5-7 pm.

Sept. 27—Fast Track at Pennyroyal Opera House, Exit 198 off I-70, Fairview, OH 7 pm.

Sept. 28—Joe Mullins & The Radio Ramblers at Back Yard Jamboree, Caesar Ford Park, 520 South Stringtown Rd., Xenia, OH 4 pm

Sept. 28—Pinnacle Ridge at Clifton Opera House, 5 South Clay Street, Clifton, OH. Music begins at 7 pm.

Sept. 29—Fast Track at Sterling Bluegrass Jamboree, 26 East Main Street, Mt. Sterling, OH. Doors open at 5. Music begins at 6. Info: 614-323-6938.

Sept. 29—Kevin Prater Band along with Five for the Gospel at General Assembly of God, 2021 East River Road, Newton Falls, OH. 12 noon. Free event.

Oct. 4—-Yonder Mountain String Band at Niswonger Performing Arts Center, 10700 OH-118, Van Wert, OH 7:30 pm

Oct. 5— Ramblin’ Bluegrass Ensemble at Loose Rail Brewing, 37 West Waterloo Street, Canal Winchester. 7-10pm

Oct. 10—The Jerry Douglas Band at Kent Stage, 175 East Maun Street, Kent, OH. Doors opens at 6:30. Music begins at 7:30.

Oct. 11—Nothin’ Fancy at at Pennyroyal Opera House, Exit 198 off I-70, Fairview, OH 7 pm.

Oct 18— Ramblin’ Bluegrass Ensemble at Byrnes Pub, 1248 West 3rd Ave., Columbus. 7-9 pm

Oct. 19—An afternoon with Peter Rowan at Furpeace Ranch, 39495 St Clair Rd, Pomeroy, OH 45769. 4 pm

Oct.19—Kentucky Heritage at Clifton Opera House, 5 South Clay Street, Clifton, OH. Music begins at 7 pm.

Oct. 19—Lonesome River Band and Ramblin’ Bluegrass Ensemble at McConnell Arts Center, 778 Evening Street, Worthington, OH. 7-19 pm.

Oct. 25—David Mayfield Parsde at Pennyroyal Opera House, Exit 198 off I-70, Fairview, OH 7 pm.

Oct. 26—Daniel Dye & The Miller Road Band at Clifton Opera House, 5 South Clay Street, Clifton, OH. Music begins at 7 pm.

Oct. 25-26—-Howl at the Moon indoor bluegrass festival, Moon City Events Center, 1208 Lunar Drive, Wapokaneta, OH , featuring Authentic Unlimited, The Kevin Prater Band, Eagles Tribute Band, Country Gentlemen Tribute Band, Ottawa County, Won Peace, Awesome Darlins, New Outlook, Uniontown and special guests Duane Sparks, Jeff Harden and Matt Ledbetter. Info: 567-204-0929.

Nov. 1—Gipson & Fitz at Byrne’s Pub Bluegrass Happy Hour, 1248 West 3rd Ave., Columbus, OH 7-9 pm

Nov. 1—Darren Nicholson Band at Pennyroyal Opera House, Exit 198 off I-70, Fairview, OH 7 pm.

Nov. 2—Kevin Prater Band at Clifton Opera House, 5 South Clay Street, Clifton, OH. Music begins at 7 pm.

Nov. 7-9—Industrial Strength Bluegrass Festival featuring Thursday: Joe Mullins & The Radio Ramblers, The Kody Norris Show and Rhonda Vincent & The Rage. Friday: Cutter & Cash and The Kentucky Grass, Heather Alley & Lincoln Mash, Joe Mullins & The Radio Ramblers, The Wyatt Ellis Band, Don Rigsby & The Fly By Knights, Larry Sparks & The Lonesome Ramblers and The Seldom Scene. Saturday: Industrial Strength Bluegrass Mandolin WorkshopHosted by David Harvey & Friends, All-Star Mandolin Mash, East Tennessee State University's Bluegrass Pride Band, Nothin' Fancy, Joe Mullins & The Radio Ramblers, Balsam Range and The Next Paige. Music begins Thursday at 6 (Doors open at 4), Friday at noon (Doors open at 10) and Saturday doors open at 10. A fan feast charity breakfast at 10:30. mandolin workshop at 11:30 and music begins at 12:30.

Niv. 8—The Price Sisters at Pennyroyal Opera House, Exit 198 off I-70, Fairview, OH 7 pm.

Nov. 9— Ramblin Bluegrass at Loose Rail Brewing, 37 West Waterloo Street, Canal Winchester. 7-10pm

Nov. 9—Blue Note at Clifton Opera House, 5 South Clay Street, Clifton, OH. Music begins at 7 pm.

Nov. 15—Slate Ridge at Byrne’s Pub Bluegrass Happy Hour, 1248 West 3rd Avenue, Columbus, OH. 7-9 pm.

Nov. 16—Berachah Valley at Clifton Opera House, 5 South Clay Street, Clifton, OH. Music begins at 7 pm.

Nov. 20—Ricky Skaggs & Kentucky Thunder at Memorial Hall OTR,

Nov. 22—Larry Stephenson Band at Pennyroyal Opera House, Exit 198 off I-70, Fairview, OH 7 pm.

Dec.6—Kevin Prater Band at Pennyroyal Opera House, Exit 198 off I-70, Fairview, OH 7 pm.

Dec. 7—New Mountain Heritage

at Clifton Opera House, 5 South Clay Street, Clifton, OH. Music begins at 7 pm.

Dec. 7—Slate Ridge at Loose Rail Brewing, 37 West Waterloo Street, Canal Winchester, OH. 7-10 pm.

Dec. 13— Ramblin Bluegrass at Byrnes Pub, 1248 West 3rd Ave., Columbus. 7-9 pm

Dec. 14—Lafferty Pike at Clifton Opera House, 5 South Clay Street, Clifton, OH. Music from 2-4 pm.

Dec.20—Jeff Parker Band at Pennyroyal Opera House, Exit 198 off I-70, Fairview, OH 7 pm.

2025

Jan. 10—Joe Mullins and the Radio Ramblers at the Marysville Winter Bluegrass Series, Cornerstone Global Methodist Church, Burnside Family Life Center, 207 S. Court St., Marysville, OH. Doors open at 6. Music begins at 7. Info: 937-642-4712.

Jan.26—The Ruta Beggars at Moon City Events Center, 1208 Lunar Drive, Wapakoneta, OH 7 pm

Mar.14—Rhonda Vincent & The Rage at the Marysville Winter Bluegrass Series, Cornerstone Global Methodist Church, Burnside Family Life Center, 207 S. Court St., Marysville, OH. Doors open at 6. Music begins at 7. Info: 937-642-4712.

Apr. 11—Ramblin’ Bluegrass Ensemble at McConnell Arts Center, 777 Evening Street, Worthington, OH. 7-9 pm.

June 13-14 Waterworks Bluegrass Bash. 711 Findlay Street, Carey, OH. Featuring Uniontown, Crabgrass, Hammertown, Muddy Krick Mountain Band, Lincoln Highway and Lincoln Mash & Heather Alley. Gates open at 6 on the 13th for camping and picking. Music starts the 14th at noon. Info: Bill Conley: 419-294-8440.
